ae9bcfc6f9cbb44da011c2b","urls":["bzz-raw://4f089d954b3ecaa26949412fe63e9a184b056562c6c13dd4a0529a5d9a2e685a","dweb:/ipfs/QmVK5iCNAMcEJQxT59bsC5E53JQASDQPU6khHox3d5ZXCn"]}},"version":1}

documentation.text: @dev LimitMarket is a proxy contract to Market that implements limit orders.
@dev LimitMarket is a proxy contract to Market that implements limit orders.

devdoc.details: LimitMarket is a proxy contract to Market that implements limit orders.

addDelegate(address).details: Enable a delegate to act on the behalf of caller

params.chaiOut: Amount of chai being bought that will be deposited in `to` wallet
params.from: Wallet providing the yDai being sold. Must have approved the operator with `market.addDelegate(operator)`.
params.maxYDaiIn: Amount of yDai being paid that will be accepted as a maximum for the trade to execute
params.to: Wallet receiving the chai being bought

params.from: Wallet providing the chai being sold. Must have approved the operator with `market.addDelegate(operator)`.
params.maxChaiIn: Amount of chai being paid that will be accepted as a maximum for the trade to execute
params.to: Wallet receiving the yDai being bought
params.yDaiOut: Amount of yDai being bought that will be deposited in `to` wallet

revokeDelegate(address).details: Stop a delegate from acting on the behalf of caller

params.chaiIn: Amount of chai being sold that will be taken from the user's wallet
params.from: Wallet providing the chai being sold. Must have approved the operator with `market.addDelegate(operator)`.
params.minYDaiOut: Amount of yDai being received that will be accepted as a minimum for the trade to execute
params.to: Wallet receiving the yDai being bought

params.from: Wallet providing the yDai being sold. Must have approved the operator with `market.addDelegate(operator)`.
params.minChaiOut: Amount of chai being received that will be accepted as a minimum for the trade to execute
params.to: Wallet receiving the chai being bought
params.yDaiIn: Amount of yDai being sold that will be taken from the user's wallet
